description:
Who thought that changing a tire could actually be easy and comfortable? This tire lever has ergonomics figured out, as well as a smart design to help you more easily remove tires. The longer lever comes in handy when dealing with stubborn tires.

  • Curved end allows for an easier removal of tire bead
  • Hooked end is designed to speed up bead removal
  • Ergonomic handle is comfortable
  • 16.5cm length improves leverage
name: MEC Pro Tire Lever
